mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ad_creative ad_user(`name`, `type`, material_type, height, width, `size`, duration, audit_status, user_id, url, create_time, update_time) VALUES ( #{creative.name}, #{creative.type}, #{creative.material_type}, #{creative.height}, #{creative.width}, #{creative.size}, #{creative.duration}, #{creative.audit_status}, #{creative.user_id}, #{creative.url}, #{creative.createTime}, #{creative.updateTime} )
